vote.title: Authorize an amendment to an existing lease agreement with Pan Coastal Limited Partnership to extend the lease agreement for an additional five years for approximately 33,967 square feet of office space located at 2121 Main Street, Floors 3, 4 and 5; 70 reserved surface parking spaces located at Elm Street and Central Expressway; and 22 reserved covered parking garage spaces located at 100 North Central Expressway, to be used by Dallas Water Utilities Capital Improvement Division for the period May 1, 2023 through April 30, 2028 - Not to exceed $3,257,435.40 - Financing: Dallas Water Utilities Fund (subject to annual appropriations)
vote.description: Authorize an amendment to an existing lease agreement with Pan Coastal Limited Partnership to extend the lease agreement for an additional five years for approximately 33,967 square feet of office space located at 2121 Main Street, Floors 3, 4 and 5; 70 reserved surface parking spaces located at Elm Street and Central Expressway; and 22 reserved covered parking garage spaces located at 100 North Central Expressway, to be used by Dallas Water Utilities Capital Improvement Division for the period May 1, 2023 through April 30, 2028 - Not to exceed $3,257,435.40 - Financing: Dallas Water Utilities Fund (subject to annual appropriations)
